extendedInfo.description: Displays all pointers touching the screen with their pointer ID, along with the size and pressure data-Size data is shown as the size of the filled circle and the thick lines.-Pressure data is shown as the size of the hollow circle and the spread of the thin lines.-A color is assigned to each pointer touching the screen.-Customizable colors, orientation, size, etc.

reviews.title: Great tool
reviews.comment: Perfect for testing; this has everything. Found out the angle of my Note stylus means more than the pressure. N-trig FTW.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!!
reviews.comment: The only app I\'ve found which let\'s me see the size and pressure of each pointer.
reviews.author: A Google User
